name: Shutterpop
description:
Embark on a trip to New New York City and check out all the cool street art! Take pictures, post them to your Postapix account, find hidden BoxCats, and Pet! The! Dog!

Shutterpop was created over the course of a month by 15ish people who had never made a video game before, and one person who had, for the SlowJam game jam.

If you take some nice photos, why not share them on twitter? Use #shutterpop or tag @nnnightshade so we can see!

CONTROLS

Move around with WASD, look around with your mouse

space to jump, shift to sprint

F to show and hide Photo Mode, left-click in Photo Mode to take a picture

Tab to show and hide the Photo Viewer

Escape to pause and quit

Created by:

Al - 3D Artist

Annie Wiebe - 3D Artist

Bryanna - 3D Artist

Camille Pacamalan - 3D Artist, Designer

Em Shibou-Savoie - 2D Artist, Designer

June Pagé - Producer, Unity Developer, Music

Levi Zacharias - 3D Artist

Melanee Tessler - 2D Character Designer, UI Artist

Sera Busceti - 2D Artist

Winson Ta (Jet) - 3D Artist, Character Design, Motivational Speaker

With additional art by:

Alecs Ong

Carly Robinson

Kristin Lanyon
